metadata.title: CVE-2019-19960 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In wolfSSL before 4.3.0, wc_ecc_mulmod_ex does not properly resistside-channel attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 4.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0+dfsg-2').
